page.title: 12MR JOHNSON, BOX FARM
page.content: Mr Johnson manages 700 acres of mixed land at Box Farm for Mr Govett. Besides himself there are 2 other workers. He has lived for 11 years in a flint and brick cottage provided with the job . MrJohnson gets up at 6.00 am. The farm has 60 heifers (young cows) on contract rearing and they have to be fed . Some of the equipment he uses is: 3 tractors, 1 baler, 1 combine harvester and 1 grain dryer. The land is fenced mainly with barbed wire but with some hedges. The crops he grows this year are: Winter wheat, winter barley, winter oats, winter beans and spring peas for human consumption. Also the farm covers pasture land, woodland, buildings.
